application.title: CEightY
application.description:
CEightY is an interpreter for software written in Chip8 that also partially supports SuperChip.
There are lots of games, demos and apps available legal and for free from the internet.
Chip8 interpreters are often referred to as emulators because of the machinecode-like look of the language.
Visit http://chip8.com/ or http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chip8 for more informations about Chip8.
